word: We know that the Lord has wrought wonderfully since we first came to Europe. Praise His holy name. . . . If you want to close the door to any benevolent impulses you can talk as if there had nothing been done worth while. We think there has much been done. At Zurich there was one man and his wife, and when we left I think there were 20, and these, as a whole, will present as good a front as any company raised up in New England. . . .
